name: Matteo Santoro
hero.description: I'm a full stack developer with 7 years of experience, specializing in Flutter and passionate about innovative technologies.
skills.title: My Skills
skills.fullstack.desc: Comprehensive experience in both front-end and back-end web development.
skills.flutter.desc: Cross-platform mobile app development using Flutter.
skills.learning.desc: Always up-to-date with the latest technologies and development trends.
projects.title: My Projects
projects.fitness.desc: A platform for nutritionists and personal trainers to manage their clients' progress. Including a mobile app for clients to track their workouts and meals and incourage them making progresses. There couldn't miss the integration with smartwatches to facilitate workouts.
about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a full stack developer with 7 years of experience in the industry. My passion for technology drives me to continuously explore new frontiers of software development. Currently, I'm expanding my skills through a university program, balancing my practical experience with a solid theoretical foundation.
about.p2: In my free time, I'm dedicated to developing a fitness app using Flutter, combining my passion for programming with an interest in wellness.
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or have questions? Don't hesitate to reach out!
